name: Run Dino Eats'!
description:
DISCLAIMER:

This game dose not include a single real dinosaur. The main character is not a Tyrannosaurus - Rex and the teal colored one isn't a Triceratops. those are imaginary creatures that are just designed to look like those dinos.

The dinosaurs shown are a mix of the idea from Jurassic World, the scientific world and a few jokes of my own.

 

RULES:

·        Even thoe the game's name is "Run Dino Eats'!",  the idea is to jump over the items thrown throwed the dinosaur.

·        The more time you survive the more points you get the more score you get.

·        Please comment for each bug you find.

 

 

 

 

Fun fact!

the dinosaur's name is Dino Eats' which is why its in the name of the game!
